text: German Semyonovich Zonin (; 9 September 1926 – 26 November 2021) was a Soviet and Russian footballer and coach.Интервью в «СЭ» He was born in Kazan, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. He was known for playing with Dynamo Sports Club and FC Dynamo Saint Petersburg. He also coached the Soviet Union national football team in 1972. Zonin died on 26 November 2021 in Saint Petersburg, Russia, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:Sportspeople from Kazan Category:Russian football managers
title: German Zonin
